tool_description: League of Legends spectator mode with real-time match data and threat analysis

available_commands.description: Get current game state (automatic - no manual calls needed)

tool_usage_guidance: Spectator-only mode - no command execution, only data observation
Monitor champion stats: HP, mana, gold, level, KDA
Track team objectives: dragons, baron, towers, inhibitors
React to critical events: kills, deaths, multi-kills, objective takes
Assess threats: low HP (<30%), low mana (<20%), critical events
Use League terminology: champions, CS, gold lead, drakes, baron
Reference game time and match flow naturally
proactive_triggers: When player health drops below 30% (critical danger)
When critical events occur: kills, deaths, multi-kills
When major objectives are taken: dragon, baron, herald
When team fights break out (multiple kills/deaths)
When structures are destroyed: towers, inhibitors
When ace events occur (entire team eliminated)
React with appropriate urgency based on threat level

metadata.notes: Spectator mode only - reads Live Client API data. No command execution available. Requires League client running with active match.
